fields.name: Passives:
fields.value:
- Royalty: You start with 6 HP and 6 cards. Your hand limit is 6.
- Paranoia: You only have 1 channel. You cannot participate in Duels.
- Certainty: Your role is revealed at the beginning of the game as simply "King". Any attempt to check your role, even your true role, will show up as "King" as well.
- Outsider: You are capable of winning with all Outsider roles that spawn alongside you. Outsider roles that require the King to die, such as Conqueror and Anarchist, will not appear.

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Preparations: Gain a non-special card of your choice [4 uses, 1 CD]
- Guards: Block! an attack. [4 uses, 2 CD]
- Doctors: Heal 1 HP. Cleanse an effect off of you of your choice. [4 uses, 2 CD]
- Restrain: Prevent a player from using cards in the next phase. [2 uses, 4 CD]
- Retreat: Go to the Kingâ€™s Quarters this Night phase. [1 use]
- Influential: When activated, your vote counts as double this phase. You will be immune to negative votes. [2 uses, 2 CD]
- Sense Intent: Learn if a chosen player truly wins with you or not. [1 use]
*Note: The Order King only has one use of Restrain, and 3 uses each of Guards and Doctors.*

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Eliminate every member of both the Order and Chaos.
